message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $13,000. I believe this price reflects its significant value to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. The product is a great value, but I'm looking to save as much as possible.
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. I could come down to $11,500, which is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $11,000. Can you consider this price?
